name: Monster Dropper
description:
Welcome to Monster Dropper (Prototype)

You play an enraged demi-god, who hates all the boardshorts wearing humans in the villages.  You've decided to drop monsters into their world and kill them all off.

Select a spawn point, pick a rally location and start spawning in your monsters!

Controls:
WASD - Scroll screen

Middle Mouse Wheel or R/F - Zoom camera

Left Mouse Button - Place rally point/select spawn point/spawn monster

Hold Right Mouse Button  or Q/E - Rotate camera

Yes, yes, it's just a prototype with lots of bugs!
